original_text:
Their tents and their flocks will be taken;
    their shelters will be carried off
    with all their goods and camels.
People will shout to them,
    ‘Terror on every side!’
korean_text: 너희는 그들의 장막과 양 떼를 빼앗으며 휘장과 모든 기구와 낙타를 빼앗아다가 소유로 삼고 그들을 향하여 외치기를 두려움이 사방에 있다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Their tents and their flocks will be taken
their shelters will be carried off
with all their goods and camels
